alert.note: Alert for Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 9:29PM CDT until June 07 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR WEBSTER COUNTY... At 929 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Cowles, or 28 miles south of Hastings, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Red Cloud around 935 PM CDT. Cowles around 940 PM CDT. Guide Rock around 950 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
